import React from 'react' import { Outlet} from 'react-router-dom' import "./App.css" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {v4 as uuidv4} from "uuid" import { useState } from 'react' const App = () => { const navigate=useNavigate(); const roomId= uuidv4() const [room,setRoom]=useState("") return (
setRoom(e.target.value)}>
) } export default App
